title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set – General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case (Orange)

Tackle everyday fixes and DIY projects with confidence. This 39-piece CARTMAN tool set bundles the most-used household tools in a compact, organized, and portable case—perfect for small repairs, furniture assembly, and around-the-house maintenance.

Key features:
- Complete 39-piece kit: Includes hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure—essential tools for common tasks.
- Durable, long-lasting tools: Heat-treated and chrome-plated for strength and performance; corrosion-resistant finish for added longevity.
- Organized storage: Sturdy plastic toolbox with dedicated tool compartments keeps everything neatly in place and easy to find.
- Portable and convenient: Lightweight design with a comfortable carrying handle for easy transport and quick access.
- Versatile use: Ideal for DIY amateurs and avid handymen alike; an excellent gift idea for new homeowners, students, or anyone starting a tool collection.
- Color: Orange for a bold, easy-to-spot look.

What’s included:
- Hammer
- Pliers
- Assorted screwdrivers
- Tape measure
- Additional everyday essentials to round out your 39-piece set

Why you’ll love it:
Quality materials, smart organization, and grab-and-go portability make this set a practical choice for routine repairs and weekend projects. Keep one at home, in the car, or in the dorm so you’re always prepared.
